front.div:
New technologies based on organic-inorganic materials are shown to be very flexible, while
they present interesting performance. The process needs only four steps, and the local
refractive index change necessary to guide light may be imprinted with a simple UV
exposure. Several solutions are given to design basic structure of guides and hence to make
optical circuits which cover the domain of power splitters to wavelength division
multiplexers, including directional couplers, gratings… Also optical amplification is shown
to be possible, and the connection problem is tackled.
